name: TruKKer Holding Limited
description: Developer of a logistics and fleet management platform designed to simplify road freight and logistics operations. The company's platform aids in integrating available trucks to the users in real-time and integrates capacity with demand accordingly to ensure maximum asset utilization to reduce overall transportation costs, enabling shippers, carriers, and businesses to get cross-border transportation services with ease.
one_liner: Developer of a logistics and fleet management platform designed to simplify road freight and logistics operations. The company's platform aids in integrating available trucks to the users in real-time and integrates capacity with demand accordingly to ensure maximum asset utilization to reduce overall transportation costs, enabling shippers, carriers, and businesses to get cross-border transportation services with ease.
